body_content.explanation: the activity of spending time looking at the goods on sale in shop windows without intending to buy any of them:
examples: They frequently went to Manchester to go window shopping.
After a little light window-shopping, I had dinner in a super-stylish Japanese restaurant.

body_content.explanation: the activity of looking, for example on the internet, at the choice of goods or services available to buy:
examples: Window shopping on the internet involves less wear and tear on your shoes.
Window-shopping online and planning that dream getaway is a fun way to spend a spare hour or so.

body_content.explanation: the act of considering the choices that are available in a particular situation before deciding what action to take:
examples: Once you get closer to an election, you stop the window shopping and you start giving some candidates more detailed attention.
